amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute constitutes the alternative budget plan proposed by the Republican Study Committee and appears on page H2870 of the Congressional Record of April 15, 2011.
amendment.purpose: An substitute amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 112=62 to establish a Fiscal Year 2012 budget and set the appropriate budgetary levels for Fiscal Year 2011 through 2021.

action.text: Amendment (A003) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Garrett.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 119 - 136, 172 Present (Roll no. 275).
